00007 FSMBeeAIControl::FSMBeeAIControl(Bee* bee)
00008 {
00009         m_bee = bee;
00010         m_bee_machine = new FSMBeeMachine(FSM_MACH_BEE);
00011         StateFollowQueen* followQueen = new StateFollowQueen();
00012         m_bee_machine->AddState(followQueen);
00013         m_bee_machine->AddState(new StateAttack());
00014         m_bee_machine->AddState(new StatePowerUp());
00015         m_bee_machine->AddState(new StateDead());
00016         m_bee_machine->SetDefaultState(followQueen);
00017 }

00019 void FSMBeeAIControl::Update(int t)
00020 {
00021         if(!m_bee)
00022         {
00023                 m_bee_machine->Reset();
00024                 return;
00025         }
00026         
00027         UpdatePerceptions(t);
00028         m_bee_machine->UpdateMachine(t);
00029 }

00031 void FSMBeeAIControl::UpdatePerceptions(int t)
00032 {
00033         m_nearestEnemy = NULL; //Game.getClosestGameObj(m_bee,GameObj::OBJ_ENEMY)
00034         m_nearestPowerUp = NULL; //Game.getClosestPowerUp(m_bee, GameObj::OBJ_POWERUP)
00035 
00036         //bee collision determination
00037         m_willCollide = false;
00038 
00039         if(m_willCollide)
00040                 m_safetyRadius = 30.0f;
00041         else
00042                 m_safetyRadius = 15.0f;
00043 
00044         if(m_nearestEnemy)
00045         {
00046                 float speed = 0; //m_bee->m_velocity.Norm
00047                 m_nearestEnemyDist = 0; //m_nearestEnemy->m_position.Distance(m_bee->m_poistion)
00048 
00049                 float dotVel;
00050                 NiPoint3 normDelta(0,0,0); //m_nearestEnemy->m_position - m_bee->m_position;
00051                 normDelta.Unitize(); //I am guessing this means Normalize???
00052 
00053                 float enemySpeed = 0; //m_nearestEnemy->m_velocity.Norm()
00054 
00055                 if(speed > enemySpeed)
00056                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_bee->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00057                 else
00058                 {
00059                         speed = enemySpeed;
00060                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_nearestEnemy->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00061 
00062                 }
00063                 float speedAdj = 0; //LERP(speed/AI_MAX_SPEED,0.0f,50.0f)*dotVel
00064                 float adjSafetyRadius = 0; //m_safetyRadius + speedAdj + m_nearestEnemy->m_size
00065 
00066                 if(m_nearestEnemyDist <= adjSafetyRadius && dotVel > 0)
00067                         m_willCollide = true;
00068         }
00069 
00070         if(m_nearestPowerUp)
00071         {
00072                 m_nearestPowerUpDist = 0; //m_nearestPowerUp->m_position.Distance(m_bee->m_position)
00073 
00074                 if(m_nearestPowerUpDist <= POWERUP_SCAN_DIST)
00075                 {
00076                         m_powerUpNear = true;
00077                 }
00078 
00079         }
00080
